     463           2 :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT2_2019);
     464           3 :         step1_wkt = transf_1->exportToWKT(formatter.get());
     465             :     }
     466             : 
     467             :     std::string step2_wkt;
     468             :     {

     470           2 :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT2_2019);

     856             :                 std::string::npos)
     857           1 :         << wkt;
     858           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(wkt.find("\"Rate of change of X-axis rotation\",-0.4") !=
     859             :                 std::string::npos)
     860           1 :         << wkt;
     861           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(wkt.find("\"Rate of change of Y-axis rotation\",-0.5") !=
     862             :                 std::string::npos)
     863           1 :         << wkt;
     864           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(wkt.find("\"Rate of change of Z-axis rotation\",-0.6") !=
     865             :                 std::string::npos)
     866           1 :         << wkt;
     867           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(wkt.find("\"Rate of change of Scale difference\",-0.7") !=
     868             :                 std::string::npos)
     869           1 :         << wkt;
     870           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(wkt.find("\"Parameter reference epoch\",2018.5") !=
     871             :                 std::string::npos)
     872           1 :         << wkt;
     873           1 : }
     874             :

    1083           8 : TEST(operation, transformation_inverse) {
    1084             : 
    1085             :     auto transf = Transformation::create(
    1086           2 :         PropertyMap()
    1087           1 :             .set(IdentifiedObject::NAME_KEY, "my transformation")
    1088           1 :             .set(Identifier::CODESPACE_KEY, "my codeSpace")
    1089           1 :             .set(Identifier::CODE_KEY, "my code"),
    1090             :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4269, nullptr,
    1091           2 :         PropertyMap()
    1092           1 :             .set(IdentifiedObject::NAME_KEY, "my operation")
    1093           1 :             .set(Identifier::CODESPACE_KEY, "my codeSpace")
    1094           1 :             .set(Identifier::CODE_KEY, "my code"),
    1095           3 :         std::vector<OperationParameterNNPtr>{OperationParameter::create(
    1096           2 :             PropertyMap().set(IdentifiedObject::NAME_KEY, "paramName"))},
    1097           4 :         std::vector<ParameterValueNNPtr>{
    1098             :             ParameterValue::createFilename("foo.bin")},
    1099           4 :         std::vector<PositionalAccuracyNNPtr>{
    1100           4 :             PositionalAccuracy::create("0.1")});
    1101           1 :     auto inv = transf->inverse();
    1102           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(inv->inverse(), transf);
    1103           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    1104             :         inv->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),
    1105             :         "COORDINATEOPERATION[\"Inverse of my transformation\",\n"
    1106             :         "    SOURCECRS[\n"
    1107             :         "        GEODCRS[\"NAD83\",\n"
    1108             :         "            DATUM[\"North American Datum 1983\",\n"
    1109             :         "                ELLIPSOID[\"GRS 1980\",6378137,298.257222101,\n"
    1110             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    1111             :         "            PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    1112             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    1113             :         "            CS[ellipsoidal,2],\n"
    1114             :         "                AXIS[\"latitude\",north,\n"
    1115             :         "                    ORDER[1],\n"
    1116             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    1117             :         "                AXIS[\"longitude\",east,\n"
    1118             :         "                    ORDER[2],\n"
    1119             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]]]],\n"
    1120             :         "    TARGETCRS[\n"
    1121             :         "        GEODCRS[\"WGS 84\",\n"
    1122             :         "            DATUM[\"World Geodetic System 1984\",\n"
    1123             :         "                ELLIPSOID[\"WGS 84\",6378137,298.257223563,\n"
    1124             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    1125             :         "            PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    1126             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    1127             :         "            CS[ellipsoidal,2],\n"
    1128             :         "                AXIS[\"latitude\",north,\n"
    1129             :         "                    ORDER[1],\n"
    1130             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    1131             :         "                AXIS[\"longitude\",east,\n"
    1132             :         "                    ORDER[2],\n"
    1133             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]]]],\n"
    1134             :         "    METHOD[\"Inverse of my operation\",\n"
    1135             :         "        ID[\"INVERSE(my codeSpace)\",\"my code\"]],\n"
    1136             :         "    PARAMETERFILE[\"paramName\",\"foo.bin\"],\n"
    1137             :         "    OPERATIONACCURACY[0.1],\n"
    1138           1 :         "    ID[\"INVERSE(my codeSpace)\",\"my code\"]]");
    1139             : 
    1140           6 :     EXPECT_THROW(inv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),

    1239           8 : TEST(operation, tmerc_export) {
    1240             :     auto conv = Conversion::createTransverseMercator(
    1241           1 :         PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Angle(2), Scale(3), Length(4), Length(5));
    1242           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->validateParameters().empty());
    1243           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    1244           1 :               "+proj=tmerc +lat_0=1 +lon_0=2 +k=3 +x_0=4 +y_0=5");
    1245             : 
    1246             :     {
    1247           2 :         auto formatter = PROJStringFormatter::create();
    1248           1 :         formatter->setUseApproxTMerc(true);
    1249           3 :         EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToPROJString(formatter.get()),
    1250           1 :                   "+proj=tmerc +approx +lat_0=1 +lon_0=2 +k=3 +x_0=4 +y_0=5");
    1251             :     }
    1252             : 
    1253           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),
    1254             :               "CONVERSION[\"Transverse Mercator\",\n"
    1255             :               "    METHOD[\"Transverse Mercator\",\n"
    1256             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",9807]],\n"
    1257             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Latitude of natural origin\",1,\n"
    1258             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    1259             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8801]],\n"
    1260             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",2,\n"
    1261             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    1262             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8802]],\n"

    1264             :               "        SCALEUNIT[\"unity\",1],\n"

    1274             :         conv->exportToWKT(
    1275             :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL).get()),

    1361           1 :         "PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",5]");
    1362             : 
    1363             :     auto wkt = "PROJCRS[\"Hartebeesthoek94 / Lo29\","
    1364             :                "  BASEGEODCRS[\"Hartebeesthoek94\","
    1365             :                "    DATUM[\"Hartebeesthoek94\","
    1366             :                "      ELLIPSOID[\"WGS "
    1367             :                "84\",6378137,298.257223563,LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1.0]]]],"
    1368             :                "  CONVERSION[\"South African Survey Grid zone 29\","
    1369             :                "    METHOD[\"Transverse Mercator (South "
    1370             :                "Orientated)\",ID[\"EPSG\",9808]],"
    1371             :                "    PARAMETER[\"Latitude of natural "
    1372             :                "origin\",0,ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.01745329252]],"
    1373             :                "    PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural "
    1374             :                "origin\",29,ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.01745329252]],"
    1375             :                "    PARAMETER[\"Scale factor at natural "
    1376             :                "origin\",1,SCALEUNIT[\"unity\",1.0]],"
    1377             :                "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",0,LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1.0]],"
    1378             :                "    PARAMETER[\"False northing\",0,LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1.0]]],"
    1379             :                "  CS[cartesian,2],"
    1380             :                "    AXIS[\"westing (Y)\",west,ORDER[1]],"
    1381             :                "    AXIS[\"southing (X)\",south,ORDER[2]],"
    1382             :                "    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1.0],"
    1383             :                "  ID[\"EPSG\",2053]]";
    1384           3 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt);
    1385           1 :     auto crs = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<ProjectedCRS>(obj);
    1386           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(crs != nullptr);
    1387           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(crs->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    1388             :               "+proj=tmerc +axis=wsu +lat_0=0 +lon_0=29 +k=1 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 "
    1389           1 :               "+ellps=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs +type=crs");
    1390             : }

    1622           1 :         "PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",4]");
    1623             : 
    1624           2 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(
    1625             :         "PROJCS[\"unnamed\","
    1626             :         "GEOGCS[\"unnamed ellipse\","
    1627             :         "    DATUM[\"unknown\","
    1628             :         "        SPHEROID[\"unnamed\",6378137,298.257223563]],"
    1629             :         "    PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0],"
    1630             :         "    UNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],"
    1631             :         "PROJECTION[\"Bonne\"],"
    1632             :         "PARAMETER[\"standard_parallel_1\",1],"
    1633             :         "PARAMETER[\"central_meridian\",2],"
    1634             :         "PARAMETER[\"false_easting\",3],"
    1635             :         "PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",4],"
    1636           3 :         "UNIT[\"metre\",1]]");
    1637           1 :     auto crs = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<ProjectedCRS>(obj);
    1638           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(crs != nullptr);
    1639           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(crs->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    1640             :               "+proj=bonne +lat_1=1 +lon_0=2 +x_0=3 +y_0=4 +ellps=WGS84 "
    1641           1 :               "+units=m +no_defs +type=crs");
    1642             : }
    1643             : 
    1644             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    1645             :

    1807           8 : TEST(operation, lcc2sp_isEquivalentTo_parallels_switched) {
    1808             :     auto conv1 = Conversion::createLambertConicConformal_2SP(
    1809           2 :         PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Angle(2), Angle(3), Angle(4), Length(5),
    1810           3 :         Length(6));
    1811             :     auto conv2 = Conversion::createLambertConicConformal_2SP(
    1812           2 :         PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Angle(2), Angle(4), Angle(3), Length(5),
    1813           3 :         Length(6));
    1814             : 
    1815           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(
    1816           1 :         conv1->isEquivalentTo(conv2.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    1817             : 
    1818             :     auto conv3 = Conversion::createLambertConicConformal_2SP(
    1819           2 :         PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Angle(2), Angle(3), Angle(3), Length(5),
    1820           3 :         Length(6));
    1821             : 
    1822           3 :     EXPECT_FALSE(
    1823           1 :         conv1->isEquivalentTo(conv3.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    1824           1 : }

    1996             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    1997             : 
    1998           8 : TEST(operation, eckert_export) {
    1999             : 
    2000           3 :     std::vector<std::string> numbers{"", "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6"};
    2001             :     std::vector<std::string> latinNumbers{"",   "I", "II", "III",
    2002           3 :                                           "IV", "V", "VI"};
    2003             : 
    2004          13 :     for (int i = 1; i <= 6; i++) {
    2005             :         auto conv =
    2006             :             (i == 1)
    2007           7 :                 ? Conversion::createEckertI(PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Length(2),
    2008           7 :                                             Length(3))
    2009             :                 : (i == 2)
    2010           7 :                       ? Conversion::createEckertII(PropertyMap(), Angle(1),
    2011           7 :                                                    Length(2), Length(3))
    2012             :                       : (i == 3)
    2013             :                             ? Conversion::createEckertIII(
    2014           7 :                                   PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Length(2), Length(3))
    2015             :                             : (i == 4) ? Conversion::createEckertIV(
    2016           7 :                                              PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Length(2),
    2017           7 :                                              Length(3))
    2018             :                                        : (i == 5) ? Conversion::createEckertV(
    2019           7 :                                                         PropertyMap(), Angle(1),
    2020           7 :                                                         Length(2), Length(3))
    2021             :                                                   :
    2022             : 
    2023             :                                                   Conversion::createEckertVI(
    2024           7 :                                                       PropertyMap(), Angle(1),
    2025          18 :                                                       Length(2), Length(3));
    2026             : 
    2027          18 :         EXPECT_TRUE(conv->validateParameters().empty());
    2028             : 
    2029          60 :         EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    2030           6 :                   "+proj=eck" + numbers[i] + " +lon_0=1 +x_0=2 +y_0=3");
    2031             : 
    2032          72 :         EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),
    2033             :                   "CONVERSION[\"Eckert " + latinNumbers[i] +
    2034             :                       "\",\n"
    2035             :                       "    METHOD[\"Eckert " +
    2036             :                       latinNumbers[i] +
    2037             :                       "\"],\n"
    2038             :                       "    PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",1,\n"
    2039             :                       "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    2040             :                       "        ID[\"EPSG\",8802]],\n"
    2041             :                       "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",2,\n"
    2042             :                       "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    2043             :                       "        ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n"
    2044             :                       "    PARAMETER[\"False northing\",3,\n"
    2045             :                       "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    2046           6 :                       "        ID[\"EPSG\",8807]]]");
    2047             : 
    2048          60 :         EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToWKT(
    2049             :                       WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL)
    2050             :                           .get()),
    2051             :                   "PROJECTION[\"Eckert_" + latinNumbers[i] +
    2052             :                       "\"],\n"
    2053             :                       "PARAMETER[\"central_meridian\",1],\n"
    2054             :                       "PARAMETER[\"false_easting\",2],\n"

    2374           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->validateParameters().empty());
    2375             : 
    2376           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    2377             :               "+proj=omerc +no_uoff +lat_0=1 +lonc=2 +alpha=3 +gamma=4 +k=5 "
    2378           1 :               "+x_0=6 +y_0=7");
    2379             : 
    2380           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),
    2381             :               "CONVERSION[\"Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A)\",\n"
    2382             :               "    METHOD[\"Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A)\",\n"
    2383             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",9812]],\n"
    2384             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Latitude of projection centre\",1,\n"
    2385             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    2386             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8811]],\n"
    2387             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Longitude of projection centre\",2,\n"
    2388             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    2389             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8812]],\n"
    2390             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Azimuth of initial line\",3,\n"
    2391             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    2392             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8813]],\n"
    2393             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Angle from Rectified to Skew Grid\",4,\n"
    2394             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    2395             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8814]],\n"
    2396             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Scale factor on initial line\",5,\n"
    2397             :               "        SCALEUNIT[\"unity\",1],\n"
    2398             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8815]],\n"
    2399             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",6,\n"
    2400             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    2401             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n"
    2402             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False northing\",7,\n"
    2403             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    2404           1 :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8807]]]");
    2405             : 
    2406           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    2407             :         conv->exportToWKT(
    2408             :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL).get()),
    2409             :         "PROJECTION[\"Hotine_Oblique_Mercator\"],\n"
    2410             :         "PARAMETER[\"latitude_of_center\",1],\n"
    2411             :         "PARAMETER[\"longitude_of_center\",2],\n"
    2412             :         "PARAMETER[\"azimuth\",3],\n"
    2413             :         "PARAMETER[\"rectified_grid_angle\",4],\n"
    2414             :         "PARAMETER[\"scale_factor\",5],\n"

    2768             :         "PROJECTION[\"Lambert_Azimuthal_Equal_Area\"],\n"

    2770             :         "PARAMETER[\"longitude_of_center\",2],\n"
    2771             :         "PARAMETER[\"false_easting\",3],\n"
    2772           1 :         "PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",4]");
    2773           1 : }
    2774             : 
    2775             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    2776             : 
    2777           8 : TEST(operation, miller_cylindrical_export) {

    2779           3 :                                                     Length(3), Length(4));
    2780           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->validateParameters().empty());
    2781             : 
    2782           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),

    2875             : 
    2876           1 :     auto conversion = crs->derivingConversion();

    2879           3 :         Angle(1), Scale(2), Length(3), Length(4));

    2891             :                "        DATUM[\"WGS 1984\",\n"

    2897             :                "    PARAMETER[\"central_meridian\",2],\n"

    2901             :                "    UNIT[\"metre\",1]]";

    2905             : 
    2906           1 :     auto conversion = crs->derivingConversion();
    2907             :     auto convRef = Conversion::createMercatorVariantB(

    2909           3 :         Angle(2), Length(3), Length(4));
    2910             : 
    2911           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conversion->isEquivalentTo(convRef.get(),
    2912           1 :                                            IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));

    3052             :         "    GEOGCS[\"WGS 84\",\n"
    3053             :         "        DATUM[\"WGS_1984\",\n"
    3054             :         "            SPHEROID[\"WGS 84\",6378137,298.257223563,\n"
    3055             :         "                AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"7030\"]],\n"
    3056             :         "            AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"6326\"]],\n"
    3057             :         "        PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    3058             :         "            AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"8901\"]],\n"
    3059             :         "        UNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433,\n"
    3060             :         "            AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"9122\"]],\n"

    3066             :         "    PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",4],\n"
    3067             :         "    UNIT[\"metre\",1,\n"

    3069             :         "    AXIS[\"Easting\",EAST],\n"
    3070             :         "    AXIS[\"Northing\",NORTH],\n"

    3072             :         "+a=6378137 +b=6378137 +lat_ts=0 +lon_0=2 "
    3073             :         "+x_0=3 +y_0=4 +k=1 +units=m "
    3074           1 :         "+nadgrids=@null +wktext +no_defs\"]]");

    3077           3 :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326, projCRS);
    3078           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    3079           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    3080             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "
    3081             :               "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad +step +proj=webmerc "
    3082           1 :               "+lat_0=0 +lon_0=2 +x_0=3 +y_0=4 +ellps=WGS84");
    3083             : 
    3084           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    3085             :         projCRS->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    3086             :         "+proj=merc +a=6378137 +b=6378137 +lat_ts=0 +lon_0=2 +x_0=3 "
    3087           1 :         "+y_0=4 +k=1 +units=m +nadgrids=@null +wktext +no_defs +type=crs");

    3129           8 : TEST(operation, webmerc_import_from_GDAL_wkt1_with_EPSG_code) {
    3130             : 
    3131             :     auto projCRS = ProjectedCRS::create(
    3132           2 :         PropertyMap()
    3133           1 :             .set(IdentifiedObject::NAME_KEY, "Pseudo-Mercator")
    3134           1 :             .set(Identifier::CODESPACE_KEY, "EPSG")
    3135           1 :             .set(Identifier::CODE_KEY, "3857"),
    3136             :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326,
    3137           2 :         Conversion::createPopularVisualisationPseudoMercator(
    3138           2 :             PropertyMap(), Angle(0), Angle(0), Length(0), Length(0)),
    3139           4 :         CartesianCS::createEastingNorthing(UnitOfMeasure::METRE));
    3140             : 
    3141             :     auto wkt1 = projCRS->exportToWKT(
    3142           5 :         WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL).get());
    3143           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(wkt1.find("3857") != std::string::npos) << wkt1;
    3144           2 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt1);
    3145           1 :     auto crs = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<ProjectedCRS>(obj);
    3146           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(crs != nullptr);
    3147           5 :     EXPECT_EQ(crs->identifiers().size(), 1U);
    3148             : }
    3149             : 
    3150             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    3151             : 
    3152           8 : TEST(operation, webmerc_import_from_GDAL_wkt1_EPSG_3785_deprecated) {

    3155             :         "PROJCS[\"Popular Visualisation CRS / Mercator (deprecated)\","

    3163             :         "            AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"8901\"]],"

    3168             :         "    PARAMETER[\"central_meridian\",0],"
    3169             :         "    PARAMETER[\"scale_factor\",1],"
    3170             :         "    PARAMETER[\"false_easting\",0],"
    3171             :         "    PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",0],"

    3175             :         "    AXIS[\"Y\",NORTH],"
    3176             :         "    EXTENSION[\"PROJ4\",\"+proj=merc +a=6378137 +b=6378137 "
    3177             :         "+lat_ts=0.0 +lon_0=0.0 +x_0=0.0 +y_0=0 +k=1.0 +units=m "
    3178             :         "+nadgrids=@null +wktext  +no_defs\"]]";

    3180           3 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt1);
    3181           1 :     auto crs = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<ProjectedCRS>(obj);
    3182           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(crs != nullptr);
    3183             : 
    3184           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    3185             :         crs->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    3186             :         "+proj=merc +a=6378137 +b=6378137 +lat_ts=0 +lon_0=0 +x_0=0 "
    3187           1 :         "+y_0=0 +k=1 +units=m +nadgrids=@null +wktext +no_defs +type=crs");
    3188             : 
    3189           1 :     auto convGot = crs->derivingConversion();
    3190             : 
    3191           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(convGot->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),

    3193             :               "    METHOD[\"Popular Visualisation Pseudo Mercator\",\n"
    3194             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",1024]],\n"
    3195             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Latitude of natural origin\",0,\n"
    3196             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    3197             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8801]],\n"
    3198             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",0,\n"
    3199             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    3200             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8802]],\n"
    3201             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",0,\n"
    3202             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"

    3211           8 : TEST(operation, webmerc_import_from_WKT2_EPSG_3785_deprecated) {
    3212           1 :     auto wkt2 =
    3213             :         "PROJCRS[\"Popular Visualisation CRS / Mercator\",\n"

    3216             :         "            ELLIPSOID[\"Popular Visualisation Sphere\",6378137,0,\n"
    3217             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    3218             :         "        PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    3219             :         "            ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]]],\n"
    3220             :         "    CONVERSION[\"Popular Visualisation Mercator\",\n"
    3221             :         "        METHOD[\"Mercator (1SP) (Spherical)\",\n"
    3222             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",9841]],\n"
    3223             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Latitude of natural origin\",0,\n"
    3224             :         "            ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    3225             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8801]],\n"
    3226             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",0,\n"
    3227             :         "            ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    3228             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8802]],\n"
    3229             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Scale factor at natural origin\",1,\n"
    3230             :         "            SCALEUNIT[\"unity\",1],\n"
    3231             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8805]],\n"
    3232             :         "        PARAMETER[\"False easting\",0,\n"
    3233             :         "            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3234             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n"
    3235             :         "        PARAMETER[\"False northing\",0,\n"
    3236             :         "            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3237             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8807]]],\n"
    3238             :         "    CS[Cartesian,2],\n"
    3239             :         "        AXIS[\"easting (X)\",east,\n"
    3240             :         "            ORDER[1],\n"
    3241             :         "            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n"
    3242             :         "        AXIS[\"northing (Y)\",north,\n"
    3243             :         "            ORDER[2],\n"
    3244             :         "            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]]";
    3245             : 
    3246           3 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt2);

    3251             :         crs->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),

    3253           1 :         "+y_0=0 +k=1 +units=m +nadgrids=@null +wktext +no_defs +type=crs");
    3254             :

    3256             :         crs->exportToWKT(
    3257             :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT2_2015).get()),
    3258           1 :         wkt2);
    3259             :

    3262             :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL).get()),

    3521             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8801]],\n"

    3523             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"

    3525             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Scale factor at natural origin\",3,\n"
    3526             :               "        SCALEUNIT[\"unity\",1],\n"
    3527             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8805]],\n"
    3528             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",4,\n"
    3529             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3530             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n"
    3531             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False northing\",5,\n"
    3532             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3533           1 :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8807]]]");
    3534             : 
    3535           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    3536             :         conv->exportToWKT(
    3537             :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL).get()),
    3538             :         "PROJECTION[\"Polar_Stereographic\"],\n"
    3539             :         "PARAMETER[\"latitude_of_origin\",90],\n"
    3540             :         "PARAMETER[\"central_meridian\",2],\n"
    3541             :         "PARAMETER[\"scale_factor\",3],\n"
    3542             :         "PARAMETER[\"false_easting\",4],\n"

    3544           1 : }
    3545             :

    3612             : 
    3613           1 :     auto conversion = crs->derivingConversion();

    3852           8 : TEST(operation, wagner_export) {
    3853             : 
    3854           3 :     std::vector<std::string> numbers{"", "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "7"};
    3855             :     std::vector<std::string> latinNumbers{"",   "I", "II", "III",
    3856           3 :                                           "IV", "V", "VI", "VII"};
    3857             : 
    3858          15 :     for (int i = 1; i <= 7; i++) {
    3859           7 :         if (i == 3)
    3860           1 :             continue;
    3861             :         auto conv =
    3862             :             (i == 1)
    3863           7 :                 ? Conversion::createWagnerI(PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Length(2),
    3864           7 :                                             Length(3))
    3865             :                 : (i == 2)
    3866           7 :                       ? Conversion::createWagnerII(PropertyMap(), Angle(1),
    3867           7 :                                                    Length(2), Length(3))
    3868             :                       : (i == 4)
    3869             :                             ? Conversion::createWagnerIV(
    3870           7 :                                   PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Length(2), Length(3))
    3871             :                             : (i == 5) ? Conversion::createWagnerV(
    3872           7 :                                              PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Length(2),
    3873           7 :                                              Length(3))
    3874             :                                        : (i == 6) ?
    3875             : 
    3876             :                                                   Conversion::createWagnerVI(
    3877           7 :                                                       PropertyMap(), Angle(1),
    3878           7 :                                                       Length(2), Length(3))
    3879             :                                                   :
    3880             : 
    3881             :                                                   Conversion::createWagnerVII(
    3882           7 :                                                       PropertyMap(), Angle(1),
    3883          18 :                                                       Length(2), Length(3));
    3884          18 :         EXPECT_TRUE(conv->validateParameters().empty());
    3885             : 
    3886          60 :         EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    3887           6 :                   "+proj=wag" + numbers[i] + " +lon_0=1 +x_0=2 +y_0=3");
    3888             : 
    3889          12 :         auto formatter = WKTFormatter::create();
    3890           6 :         formatter->simulCurNodeHasId();
    3891          54 :         EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToWKT(formatter.get()),
    3892             :                   "CONVERSION[\"Wagner " + latinNumbers[i] +
    3893             :                       "\",\n"
    3894             :                       "    METHOD[\"Wagner " +
    3895             :                       latinNumbers[i] +
    3896             :                       "\"],\n"
    3897             :                       "    PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",1,\n"
    3898             :                       "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    3899             :                       "        ID[\"EPSG\",8802]],\n"
    3900             :                       "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",2,\n"
    3901             :                       "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3902             :                       "        ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n"
    3903             :                       "    PARAMETER[\"False northing\",3,\n"
    3904             :                       "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3905           6 :                       "        ID[\"EPSG\",8807]]]");
    3906             : 
    3907          60 :         EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToWKT(
    3908             :                       WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL)
    3909             :                           .get()),
    3910             :                   "PROJECTION[\"Wagner_" + latinNumbers[i] +
    3911             :                       "\"],\n"
    3912             :                       "PARAMETER[\"central_meridian\",1],\n"
    3913             :                       "PARAMETER[\"false_easting\",2],\n"
    3914           6 :                       "PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",3]");
    3915             :     }
    3916           1 : }
    3917             : 
    3918             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    3919             : 
    3920           8 : TEST(operation, wagnerIII_export) {
    3921             : 
    3922           2 :     auto conv = Conversion::createWagnerIII(PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Angle(2),
    3923           3 :                                             Length(3), Length(4));
    3924             : 
    3925           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    3926           1 :               "+proj=wag3 +lat_ts=1 +lon_0=2 +x_0=3 +y_0=4");
    3927             : 
    3928           2 :     auto formatter = WKTFormatter::create();
    3929           1 :     formatter->simulCurNodeHasId();
    3930           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->exportToWKT(formatter.get()),
    3931             :               "CONVERSION[\"Wagner III\",\n"
    3932             :               "    METHOD[\"Wagner III\"],\n"
    3933             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Latitude of true scale\",1,\n"
    3934             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    3935             :               "    PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",2,\n"
    3936             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    3937             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8802]],\n"
    3938             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",3,\n"
    3939             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3940             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n"
    3941             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False northing\",4,\n"
    3942             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    3943           1 :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8807]]]");
    3944             : 
    3945           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    3946             :         conv->exportToWKT(
    3947             :             WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT1_GDAL).get()),
    3948             :         "PROJECTION[\"Wagner_III\"],\n"
    3949             :         "PARAMETER[\"latitude_of_origin\",1],\n"
    3950             :         "PARAMETER[\"central_meridian\",2],\n"
    3951             :         "PARAMETER[\"false_easting\",3],\n"
    3952           1 :         "PARAMETER[\"false_northing\",4]");
    3953           1 : }

    4031           1 :         PropertyMap(), Angle(1), Angle(2), Scale(3), Length(4), Length(5));

    4034           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(inv->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),

    4036             :               "    METHOD[\"Inverse of Transverse Mercator\",\n"

    4042             :               "        ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"

    4046             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8805]],\n"
    4047             :               "    PARAMETER[\"False easting\",4,\n"
    4048             :               "        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    4049             :               "        ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n"

    4054           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(inv->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4055             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +inv +proj=tmerc +lat_0=1 +lon_0=2 +k=3 "
    4056           1 :               "+x_0=4 +y_0=5");
    4057             : 
    4058           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(inv->isEquivalentTo(inv.get()));
    4059           4 :     EXPECT_FALSE(inv->isEquivalentTo(createUnrelatedObject().get()));
    4060             : 
    4061           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(
    4062           1 :         conv->isEquivalentTo(conv->CoordinateOperation::shallowClone().get()));
    4063           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(
    4064           1 :         inv->isEquivalentTo(inv->CoordinateOperation::shallowClone().get()));
    4065           1 : }

    4255             : 
    4256             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    4257             : 
    4258           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_context_default) {
    4259             :     auto authFactory =
    4260           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    4261           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0);
    4262           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    4263             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    4264           1 :     ctxt->setAllowUseIntermediateCRS(
    4265             :         CoordinateOperationContext::IntermediateCRSUse::NEVER);
    4266             : 
    4267             :     // Directly found in database
    4268             :     {
    4269           2 :         auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    4270           3 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4179"), // Pulkovo 42
    4271           3 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4258"), // ETRS89
    4272           2 :             ctxt);
    4273           4 :         ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 3U);
    4274             :         // Romania has a larger area than Poland (given our approx formula)
    4275           4 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->getEPSGCode(), 15994); // Romania - 3m
    4276           4 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[1]->getEPSGCode(), 1644);  // Poland - 1m
    4277           3 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[2]->nameStr(),
    4278           1 :                   "Ballpark geographic offset from Pulkovo 1942(58) to ETRS89");
    4279             : 
    4280           7 :         EXPECT_EQ(
    4281             :             list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4282             :             "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "
    4283             :             "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad +step +proj=push +v_3 "
    4284             :             "+step +proj=cart +ellps=krass +step +proj=helmert +x=2.3287 "
    4285             :             "+y=-147.0425 +z=-92.0802 +rx=0.3092483 +ry=-0.32482185 "
    4286             :             "+rz=-0.49729934 +s=5.68906266 +convention=coordinate_frame +step "
    4287             :             "+inv +proj=cart +ellps=GRS80 +step +proj=pop +v_3 +step "
    4288             :             "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg +step +proj=axisswap "
    4289           1 :             "+order=2,1");
    4290             :     }
    4291             : 
    4292             :     // Reverse case
    4293             :     {
    4294           2 :         auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    4295           3 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4258"),
    4296           5 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4179"), ctxt);
    4297           4 :         ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 3U);
    4298             :         // Romania has a larger area than Poland (given our approx formula)
    4299           3 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->nameStr(),
    4300           1 :                   "Inverse of Pulkovo 1942(58) to ETRS89 (4)"); // Romania - 3m
    4301             : 
    4302           7 :         EXPECT_EQ(
    4303             :             list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4304             :             "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "
    4305             :             "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad +step +proj=push +v_3 "
    4306             :             "+step +proj=cart +ellps=GRS80 +step +inv +proj=helmert +x=2.3287 "
    4307             :             "+y=-147.0425 +z=-92.0802 +rx=0.3092483 +ry=-0.32482185 "
    4308             :             "+rz=-0.49729934 +s=5.68906266 +convention=coordinate_frame +step "
    4309             :             "+inv +proj=cart +ellps=krass +step +proj=pop +v_3 +step "
    4310             :             "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg +step +proj=axisswap "
    4311           1 :             "+order=2,1");
    4312             :     }
    4313             : }
    4314             : 
    4315             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    4316             : 
    4317           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_context_match_by_name) {
    4318             :     auto authFactory =
    4319           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    4320           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0);
    4321           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    4322             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    4323           1 :     ctxt->setAllowUseIntermediateCRS(
    4324             :         CoordinateOperationContext::IntermediateCRSUse::NEVER);
    4325             :     auto NAD27 = GeographicCRS::create(
    4326           2 :         PropertyMap().set(IdentifiedObject::NAME_KEY,
    4327           1 :                           GeographicCRS::EPSG_4267->nameStr()),
    4328             :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4267->datum(),
    4329             :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4267->datumEnsemble(),
    4330           2 :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4267->coordinateSystem());
    4331           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    4332           4 :         NAD27, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326, ctxt);
    4333           2 :     auto listInv = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    4334           4 :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326, NAD27, ctxt);
    4335           2 :     auto listRef = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    4336           4 :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4267, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326, ctxt);
    4337           5 :     EXPECT_EQ(list.size(), listRef.size());
    4338           5 :     EXPECT_EQ(listInv.size(), listRef.size());
    4339           3 :     EXPECT_GE(listRef.size(), 2U);
    4340           1 : }
    4341             : 
    4342             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    4343             :

    4374           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_context_filter_bbox) {
    4375             :     auto authFactory =
    4376           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    4377             :     // INSERT INTO "area" VALUES('EPSG','1197','Romania','Romania - onshore and
    4378             :     // offshore.',43.44,48.27,20.26,31.41,0);
    4379             :     {

    4432           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_context_inverse_needed) {
    4433             :     auto authFactory =
    4434           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");

    4437           2 :             CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);

    4445           2 :             ctxt);

    4448             :             list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),

    4450             :             "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad +step +proj=push +v_3 "
    4451             :             "+step +proj=cart +ellps=clrk80ign +step +proj=helmert +x=-168 "
    4452             :             "+y=-60 +z=320 +step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=GRS80 +step +proj=pop "
    4453             :             "+v_3 +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg +step "

    4456             :                       PROJStringFormatter::create(

    4459             :                           .get()),

    4539           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_context_NAD27_to_WGS84) {
    4540             :     auto authFactory =
    4541           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    4542           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    4543           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    4544             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    4545           1 :     ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    4546             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    4547             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);
    4548             : 
    4549           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    4550           3 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4267"), // NAD27
    4551           3 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4326"), // WGS84
    4552           2 :         ctxt);
    4553           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 78U);
    4554           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->nameStr(),
    4555           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (33)"); // 1.0 m, Canada - NAD27
    4556           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[1]->nameStr(),
    4557           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (3)"); // 20.0 m, Canada - NAD27
    4558           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[2]->nameStr(),
    4559           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (79)"); // 5.0 m, USA - CONUS including EEZ
    4560           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[3]->nameStr(),
    4561           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (4)"); // 10.0 m, USA - CONUS - onshore
    4562             : }
    4563             : 
    4564             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    4565             : 
    4566           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_context_NAD27_to_WGS84_G1762) {

    4568           4 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), std::string());
    4569           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    4570           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    4571             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    4572           1 :     ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    4573             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    4574             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);

    4576             :     auto authFactoryEPSG =
    4577           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");

    4579             :         // NAD27

    4581             :         // WGS84 (G1762)

    4585           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (33) + WGS 84 to WGS 84 (G1762)");
    4586           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4587             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 "

    4589             :               "+step +proj=hgridshift +grids=ntv2_0.gsb "
    4590             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg "
    4591           1 :               "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");

    4593           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (3) + WGS 84 to WGS 84 (G1762)");

    4595           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (79) + WGS 84 to WGS 84 (G1762)");
    4596           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[3]->nameStr(),
    4597           1 :               "NAD27 to WGS 84 (4) + WGS 84 to WGS 84 (G1762)");
    4598             : }

    4602           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_context_WGS84_G1674_to_WGS84_G1762) {
    4603             :     // Check that particular behaviour with WGS 84 (Gxxx) related to
    4604             :     // 'geodetic_datum_preferred_hub' table and custom no-op transformations
    4605             :     // between WGS 84 and WGS 84 (Gxxx) doesn't affect direct transformations
    4606             :     // to those realizations.
    4607             :     auto authFactory =
    4608           4 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), std::string());
    4609           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    4610             : 
    4611             :     auto authFactoryEPSG =
    4612           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    4613           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    4614             :         // WGS84 (G1674)
    4615           3 :         authFactoryEPSG->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("9056"),
    4616             :         // WGS84 (G1762)
    4617           5 :         authFactoryEPSG->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("9057"), ctxt);
    4618           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 1U);
    4619           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4620             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 "
    4621             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad "
    4622             :               "+step +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 "
    4623             :               "+step +proj=helmert +x=-0.004 +y=0.003 +z=0.004 +rx=0.00027 "
    4624             :               "+ry=-0.00027 +rz=0.00038 +s=-0.0069 "
    4625             :               "+convention=coordinate_frame "
    4626             :               "+step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 "
    4627             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg "
    4628           1 :               "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");

    4684           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_noop) {
    4685             : 
    4686           2 :     auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    4687           3 :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326);
    4688           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    4689           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->nameStr(), "Null geographic offset from WGS 84 to WGS 84");
    4690           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4691           1 :               "+proj=noop");
    4692           4 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->inverse()->nameStr(), op->nameStr());

    4695             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    4696             : 
    4697           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_to_geogCRS_longitude_rotation) {
    4698             : 
    4699             :     auto src = GeographicCRS::create(
    4700           2 :         PropertyMap().set(IdentifiedObject::NAME_KEY, "A"),
    4701           2 :         GeodeticReferenceFrame::create(PropertyMap(), Ellipsoid::WGS84,
    4702           1 :                                        optional<std::string>(),
    4703             :                                        PrimeMeridian::GREENWICH),
    4704           3 :         EllipsoidalCS::createLatitudeLongitude(UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE));
    4705             :     auto dest = GeographicCRS::create(
    4706           2 :         PropertyMap().set(IdentifiedObject::NAME_KEY, "B"),
    4707           2 :         GeodeticReferenceFrame::create(PropertyMap(), Ellipsoid::WGS84,
    4708           1 :                                        optional<std::string>(),
    4709             :                                        PrimeMeridian::PARIS),
    4710           3 :         EllipsoidalCS::createLatitudeLongitude(UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE));
    4711             : 
    4712           5 :     auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(src, dest);
    4713           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    4714           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4715             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "
    4716             :               "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad +step +proj=longlat "
    4717             :               "+ellps=WGS84 +pm=paris +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad "
    4718           1 :               "+xy_out=deg +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    4719          20 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->inverse()->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),
    4720             :               CoordinateOperationFactory::create()
    4721             :                   ->createOperation(dest, src)
    4722           1 :                   ->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()));
    4723           8 :     EXPECT_TRUE(
    4724             :         op->inverse()->isEquivalentTo(CoordinateOperationFactory::create()
    4725             :                                           ->createOperation(dest, src)
    4726           1 :                                           .get()));
    4727             : }
    4728             : 
    4729             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

    4857             :             list[1]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),

    4971           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(srcCRS != nullptr);
    4972             :

    4974           3 :         "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +type=crs");

    4976           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(dstCRS != nullptr);
    4977             :

    4980           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    4981           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    4982             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "

    5021           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(src_from_wkt2), dst, ctxt);

    5027             :             op->isEquivalentTo(op2.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT))

    5096           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    5097           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);

    5105           1 :               "Conversion from WGS 84 (geog2D) to WGS 84 (geocentric)");
    5106           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5107             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "
    5108             :               "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad +step +proj=cart "
    5109           1 :               "+ellps=WGS84");
    5110             : 
    5111           4 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->inverse()->nameStr(),
    5112           1 :               "Conversion from WGS 84 (geocentric) to WGS 84 (geog2D)");
    5113           9 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->inverse()->exportToPROJString(
    5114             :                   PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5115             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 +step "
    5116             :               "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg +step +proj=axisswap "
    5117           1 :               "+order=2,1");
    5118             : }
    5119             :

    5283           8 : TEST(operation, esri_projectedCRS_to_geogCRS_with_ITRF_intermediate_context) {
    5284           2 :     auto dbContext = DatabaseContext::create();
    5285           2 :     auto authFactoryEPSG = AuthorityFactory::create(dbContext, "EPSG");
    5286           2 :     auto authFactoryESRI = AuthorityFactory::create(dbContext, "ESRI");
    5287             :     auto ctxt =
    5288           2 :         CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactoryEPSG, nullptr, 0.0);
    5289           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    5290             :         // NAD_1983_CORS96_StatePlane_North_Carolina_FIPS_3200_Ft_US (projected)
    5291           3 :         authFactoryESRI->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("103501"),
    5292             :         // ITRF2005 (geog3D)
    5293           5 :         authFactoryEPSG->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("7910"), ctxt);
    5294           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 1U);
    5295           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->nameStr(),
    5296             :               "Inverse of NAD_1983_CORS96_StatePlane_North_Carolina_"
    5297             :               "FIPS_3200_Ft_US + "
    5298             :               "Conversion from NAD83(CORS96) (geog2D) to NAD83(CORS96) "
    5299             :               "(geocentric) + Inverse of ITRF2000 to NAD83(CORS96) (1) + "
    5300             :               "ITRF2000 to ITRF2005 (1) + "
    5301           1 :               "Conversion from ITRF2005 (geocentric) to ITRF2005 (geog3D)");
    5302           8 :     EXPECT_PRED_FORMAT2(
    5303             :         ComparePROJString,
    5304             :         list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5305             :         "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=us-ft +z_in=us-ft "
    5306             :         "+xy_out=m +z_out=m +step +inv +proj=lcc +lat_0=33.75 +lon_0=-79 "
    5307             :         "+lat_1=34.3333333333333 +lat_2=36.1666666666667 "
    5308             :         "+x_0=609601.219202438 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +step +proj=cart "
    5309             :         "+ellps=GRS80 +step +inv +proj=helmert +x=0.9956 +y=-1.9013 "
    5310             :         "+z=-0.5215 +rx=0.025915 +ry=0.009426 +rz=0.011599 +s=0.00062 "
    5311             :         "+dx=0.0007 +dy=-0.0007 +dz=0.0005 +drx=6.7e-05 +dry=-0.000757 "
    5312             :         "+drz=-5.1e-05 +ds=-0.00018 +t_epoch=1997 "
    5313             :         "+convention=coordinate_frame +step +proj=helmert +x=-0.0001 "
    5314             :         "+y=0.0008 +z=0.0058 +rx=0 +ry=0 +rz=0 +s=-0.0004 +dx=0.0002 "
    5315             :         "+dy=-0.0001 +dz=0.0018 +drx=0 +dry=0 +drz=0 +ds=-8e-05 "
    5316             :         "+t_epoch=2000 +convention=position_vector +step +inv +proj=cart "
    5317             :         "+ellps=GRS80 +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +z_in=m "
    5318           1 :         "+xy_out=deg +z_out=m +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");

    5355           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_longlat_to_geogCS_latlong) {
    5356             : 
    5357             :     auto sourceCRS = GeographicCRS::OGC_CRS84;
    5358             :     auto targetCRS = GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326;
    5359           2 :     auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(sourceCRS,
    5360           3 :                                                                     targetCRS);
    5361           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    5362           1 :     auto conv = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<Conversion>(op);
    5363           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(conv != nullptr);
    5364           7 :     EXPECT_TRUE(op->sourceCRS() &&
    5365           1 :                 op->sourceCRS()->isEquivalentTo(sourceCRS.get()));
    5366           7 :     EXPECT_TRUE(op->targetCRS() &&
    5367           1 :                 op->targetCRS()->isEquivalentTo(targetCRS.get()));
    5368           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5369           1 :               "+proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    5370           2 :     auto convInverse = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<Conversion>(conv->inverse());
    5371           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(convInverse != nullptr);
    5372           7 :     EXPECT_TRUE(convInverse->sourceCRS() &&
    5373           1 :                 convInverse->sourceCRS()->isEquivalentTo(targetCRS.get()));
    5374           7 :     EXPECT_TRUE(convInverse->targetCRS() &&
    5375           1 :                 convInverse->targetCRS()->isEquivalentTo(sourceCRS.get()));
    5376          14 :     EXPECT_EQ(conv->method()->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()),
    5377           1 :               convInverse->method()->exportToWKT(WKTFormatter::create().get()));
    5378           6 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->method()->isEquivalentTo(convInverse->method().get()));
    5379             : }

    5434             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    5435             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);

    5437             :         CoordinateOperationContext::IntermediateCRSUse::ALWAYS);

    5439           3 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4807"),  // NTF(Paris)

    5449             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "
    5450             :               "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=grad +xy_out=rad +step +inv "

    5478             : }
    5479             : 
    5480             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    5481             : 
    5482           8 : TEST(operation, projCRS_no_id_to_geogCRS_context) {
    5483             :     auto authFactory =
    5484           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    5485           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    5486             :     auto src = authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem(
    5487           2 :         "28992"); // Amersfoort / RD New
    5488             :     auto dst =
    5489           2 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4258"); // ETRS89 2D
    5490             :     auto list =
    5491           4 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(src, dst, ctxt);
    5492           3 :     ASSERT_GE(list.size(), 1U);
    5493             :     auto wkt2 =
    5494             :         "PROJCRS[\"unknown\",\n"
    5495             :         "    BASEGEOGCRS[\"Amersfoort\",\n"
    5496             :         "       DATUM[\"Amersfoort\",\n"
    5497             :         "            ELLIPSOID[\"Bessel 1841\",6377397.155,299.1528128]]],\n"
    5498             :         "    CONVERSION[\"unknown\",\n"
    5499             :         "        METHOD[\"Oblique Stereographic\"],\n"
    5500             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Latitude of natural origin\",52.1561605555556],\n"
    5501             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",5.38763888888889],\n"
    5502             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Scale factor at natural origin\",0.9999079],\n"
    5503             :         "        PARAMETER[\"False easting\",155000],\n"
    5504             :         "        PARAMETER[\"False northing\",463000]],\n"
    5505             :         "    CS[Cartesian,2],\n"
    5506             :         "        AXIS[\"(E)\",east],\n"
    5507             :         "        AXIS[\"(N)\",north],\n"
    5508             :         "    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    5509             :         "    ID[\"EPSG\",28992]]";
    5510           3 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt2);
    5511           1 :     auto src_from_wkt2 = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(obj);
    5512           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src_from_wkt2 != nullptr);
    5513           2 :     auto list2 = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    5514           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(src_from_wkt2), dst, ctxt);
    5515           4 :     ASSERT_GE(list.size(), list2.size() - 1);
    5516          17 :     for (size_t i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
    5517             :         const auto &op = list[i];
    5518           5 :         const auto &op2 = list2[i];
    5519          15 :         EXPECT_TRUE(
    5520           5 :             op->isEquivalentTo(op2.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    5521             :     }
    5522             : }
    5523             : 
    5524             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    5525             : 
    5526           8 : TEST(operation, geogCRS_3D_to_projCRS_with_2D_geocentric_translation) {
    5527             : 
    5528             :     auto authFactory =
    5529           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    5530           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    5531             :     auto src =
    5532           2 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4979"); // WGS 84 3D
    5533             : 
    5534             :     // Azores Central 1948 / UTM zone 26N
    5535           2 :     auto dst = authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("2189");
    5536             : 
    5537             :     auto list =
    5538           4 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(src, dst, ctxt);
    5539           3 :     ASSERT_GE(list.size(), 1U);
    5540           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5541             :               "+proj=pipeline "
    5542             :               "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 "
    5543             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +z_in=m +xy_out=rad +z_out=m "
    5544             :               "+step +proj=push +v_3 " // this is what we check
    5545             :               "+step +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 "
    5546             :               "+step +proj=helmert +x=104 +y=-167 +z=38 "
    5547             :               "+step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=intl "
    5548             :               "+step +proj=pop +v_3 " // this is what we check
    5549           1 :               "+step +proj=utm +zone=26 +ellps=intl");
    5550             : 
    5551             :     auto listReverse =
    5552           4 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(dst, src, ctxt);
    5553           3 :     ASSERT_GE(listReverse.size(), 1U);
    5554           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    5555             :         listReverse[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5556             :         "+proj=pipeline "
    5557             :         "+step +inv +proj=utm +zone=26 +ellps=intl "
    5558             :         "+step +proj=push +v_3 " // this is what we check
    5559             :         "+step +proj=cart +ellps=intl "
    5560             :         "+step +proj=helmert +x=-104 +y=167 +z=-38 "
    5561             :         "+step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 "
    5562             :         "+step +proj=pop +v_3 " // this is what we check
    5563             :         "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +z_in=m +xy_out=deg +z_out=m "
    5564           1 :         "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    5565             : }
    5566             :

    5740           8 : TEST(operation, projCRS_to_projCRS_through_geog3D) {
    5741             :     // Check that when going from projCRS to projCRS, using
    5742             :     // geog2D-->geog3D-->geog3D-->geog2D we do not have issues with
    5743             :     // inconsistent CRS chaining, due to how we 'hack' a bit some intermediate
    5744             :     // steps
    5745             :     auto authFactory =
    5746           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    5747           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    5748           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    5749           3 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("5367"), // CR05 / CRTM05
    5750           3 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem(
    5751             :             "8908"), // CR-SIRGAS / CRTM05
    5752           2 :         ctxt);
    5753           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 1U);
    5754           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5755             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 "
    5756             :               "+step +inv +proj=tmerc +lat_0=0 +lon_0=-84 +k=0.9999 "
    5757             :               "+x_0=500000 +y_0=0 +ellps=WGS84 "
    5758             :               "+step +proj=push +v_3 "
    5759             :               "+step +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 "
    5760             :               "+step +proj=helmert +x=-0.16959 +y=0.35312 +z=0.51846 "
    5761             :               "+rx=-0.03385 +ry=0.16325 +rz=-0.03446 +s=0.03693 "
    5762             :               "+convention=position_vector "
    5763             :               "+step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=GRS80 "
    5764             :               "+step +proj=pop +v_3 "
    5765             :               "+step +proj=tmerc +lat_0=0 +lon_0=-84 +k=0.9999 +x_0=500000 "
    5766           1 :               "+y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80");
    5767             : }
    5768             : 
    5769             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    5770             :

    5825           8 : TEST(operation, createOperation_boundCRS_identified_by_datum) {
    5826           2 :     auto objSrc = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    5827           3 :         "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +type=crs");
    5828           1 :     auto src = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<GeographicCRS>(objSrc);
    5829           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src != nullptr);
    5830             : 
    5831           2 :     auto objDest = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    5832             :         "+proj=utm +zone=32 +a=6378249.2 +b=6356515 "
    5833           3 :         "+towgs84=-263.0,6.0,431.0 +no_defs +type=crs");
    5834           1 :     auto dest = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<BoundCRS>(objDest);
    5835           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(dest != nullptr);
    5836             : 
    5837           2 :     auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    5838           7 :         NN_CHECK_ASSERT(src), NN_CHECK_ASSERT(dest));
    5839           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    5840           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5841             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad "
    5842             :               "+step +proj=push +v_3 +step +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 +step "
    5843             :               "+proj=helmert +x=263 +y=-6 +z=-431 +step +inv +proj=cart "
    5844             :               "+ellps=clrk80ign +step +proj=pop +v_3 +step +proj=utm +zone=32 "
    5845           1 :               "+ellps=clrk80ign");
    5846             : 
    5847             :     auto authFactory =
    5848           4 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), std::string());
    5849           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    5850           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    5851           8 :         NN_CHECK_ASSERT(src), NN_CHECK_ASSERT(dest), ctxt);
    5852           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 1U);
    5853           4 :     EXPECT_TRUE(list[0]->isEquivalentTo(op.get()));
    5854             : }
    5855             : 
    5856             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    5857             : 
    5858           8 : TEST(operation, boundCRS_of_clrk_66_geogCRS_to_nad83_geogCRS) {
    5859           2 :     auto objSrc = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    5860           3 :         "+proj=latlong +ellps=clrk66 +nadgrids=ntv1_can.dat,conus +type=crs");
    5861           1 :     auto src = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(objSrc);
    5862           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src != nullptr);
    5863             : 
    5864           2 :     auto objDest = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    5865           3 :         "+proj=latlong +datum=NAD83 +type=crs");
    5866           1 :     auto dest = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(objDest);
    5867           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(dest != nullptr);
    5868             : 
    5869           2 :     auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    5870           7 :         NN_CHECK_ASSERT(src), NN_CHECK_ASSERT(dest));
    5871           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    5872           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    5873             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad "
    5874             :               "+step +proj=hgridshift +grids=ntv1_can.dat,conus "
    5875           1 :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg");
    5876             : }
    5877             :
