    6086           8 : TEST(operation, boundCRS_with_basecrs_with_extent_to_geogCRS) {
    6087             : 
    6088             :     auto wkt =
    6089             :         "BOUNDCRS[\n"
    6090             :         "    SOURCECRS[\n"
    6091             :         "        PROJCRS[\"NAD83 / California zone 3 (ftUS)\",\n"
    6092             :         "            BASEGEODCRS[\"NAD83\",\n"
    6093             :         "                DATUM[\"North American Datum 1983\",\n"
    6094             :         "                    ELLIPSOID[\"GRS 1980\",6378137,298.257222101,\n"
    6095             :         "                        LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    6096             :         "                PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    6097             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]]],\n"
    6098             :         "            CONVERSION[\"SPCS83 California zone 3 (US Survey "
    6099             :         "feet)\",\n"
    6100             :         "                METHOD[\"Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)\",\n"
    6101             :         "                    ID[\"EPSG\",9802]],\n"
    6102             :         "                PARAMETER[\"Latitude of false origin\",36.5,\n"
    6103             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    6104             :         "                    ID[\"EPSG\",8821]],\n"
    6105             :         "                PARAMETER[\"Longitude of false origin\",-120.5,\n"
    6106             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    6107             :         "                    ID[\"EPSG\",8822]],\n"
    6108             :         "                PARAMETER[\"Latitude of 1st standard parallel\","
    6109             :         "                    38.4333333333333,\n"
    6110             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    6111             :         "                    ID[\"EPSG\",8823]],\n"
    6112             :         "                PARAMETER[\"Latitude of 2nd standard parallel\","
    6113             :         "                    37.0666666666667,\n"
    6114             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    6115             :         "                    ID[\"EPSG\",8824]],\n"
    6116             :         "                PARAMETER[\"Easting at false origin\",6561666.667,\n"
    6117             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"US survey foot\","
    6118             :         "                    0.304800609601219],\n"
    6119             :         "                    ID[\"EPSG\",8826]],\n"
    6120             :         "                PARAMETER[\"Northing at false origin\",1640416.667,\n"
    6121             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"US survey foot\","
    6122             :         "                    0.304800609601219],\n"
    6123             :         "                    ID[\"EPSG\",8827]]],\n"
    6124             :         "            CS[Cartesian,2],\n"
    6125             :         "                AXIS[\"easting (X)\",east,\n"
    6126             :         "                    ORDER[1],\n"
    6127             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"US survey foot\","
    6128             :         "                    0.304800609601219]],\n"
    6129             :         "                AXIS[\"northing (Y)\",north,\n"
    6130             :         "                    ORDER[2],\n"
    6131             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"US survey foot\","
    6132             :         "                    0.304800609601219]],\n"
    6133             :         "            SCOPE[\"unknown\"],\n"
    6134             :         "            AREA[\"USA - California - SPCS - 3\"],\n"
    6135             :         "            BBOX[36.73,-123.02,38.71,-117.83],\n"
    6136             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",2227]]],\n"
    6137             :         "    TARGETCRS[\n"
    6138             :         "        GEODCRS[\"WGS 84\",\n"
    6139             :         "            DATUM[\"World Geodetic System 1984\",\n"
    6140             :         "                ELLIPSOID[\"WGS 84\",6378137,298.257223563,\n"
    6141             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    6142             :         "            PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    6143             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    6144             :         "            CS[ellipsoidal,2],\n"
    6145             :         "                AXIS[\"latitude\",north,\n"
    6146             :         "                    ORDER[1],\n"
    6147             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    6148             :         "                AXIS[\"longitude\",east,\n"
    6149             :         "                    ORDER[2],\n"
    6150             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    6151             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",4326]]],\n"
    6152             :         "    ABRIDGEDTRANSFORMATION[\"NAD83 to WGS 84 (1)\",\n"
    6153             :         "        METHOD[\"Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)\",\n"
    6154             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",9603]],\n"
    6155             :         "        PARAMETER[\"X-axis translation\",0,\n"
    6156             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8605]],\n"
    6157             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Y-axis translation\",0,\n"
    6158             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8606]],\n"
    6159             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Z-axis translation\",0,\n"
    6160             :         "            ID[\"EPSG\",8607]],\n"
    6161             :         "        SCOPE[\"unknown\"],\n"
    6162             :         "        AREA[\"North America - Canada and USA (CONUS, Alaska "
    6163             :         "mainland)\"],\n"
    6164             :         "        BBOX[23.81,-172.54,86.46,-47.74],\n"
    6165             :         "        ID[\"EPSG\",1188]]]";
    6166           3 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt);
    6167           1 :     auto boundCRS = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<BoundCRS>(obj);
    6168           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(boundCRS != nullptr);
    6169           2 :     auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    6170           5 :         NN_CHECK_ASSERT(boundCRS), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326);
    6171           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    6172           2 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->nameStr(), "Inverse of SPCS83 California zone 3 (US Survey "
    6173           1 :                              "feet) + NAD83 to WGS 84 (1)");
    6174             : }

    6178           8 : TEST(operation, ETRS89_3D_to_proj_string_with_geoidgrids_nadgrids) {

    6180           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    6181             :     // ETRS89 3D
    6182           2 :     auto src = authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4937");

    6184             :         "+proj=sterea +lat_0=52.15616055555555 +lon_0=5.38763888888889 "
    6185             :         "+k=0.9999079 +x_0=155000 +y_0=463000 +ellps=bessel "
    6186             :         "+nadgrids=rdtrans2008.gsb +geoidgrids=naptrans2008.gtx +units=m "
    6187           3 :         "+type=crs");

    6193           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 1U);
    6194           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    6195             :               "+proj=pipeline "

    6197             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad "
    6198             :               "+step +inv +proj=vgridshift +grids=naptrans2008.gtx "
    6199             :               "+multiplier=1 "
    6200             :               "+step +inv +proj=hgridshift +grids=rdtrans2008.gsb "
    6201             :               "+step +proj=sterea +lat_0=52.1561605555556 "
    6202             :               "+lon_0=5.38763888888889 +k=0.9999079 +x_0=155000 "
    6203           1 :               "+y_0=463000 +ellps=bessel");
    6204             : }

    6207             : 
    6208           8 : TEST(operation, WGS84_G1762_to_compoundCRS_with_bound_vertCRS) {
    6209             :     auto authFactoryEPSG =
    6210           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    6211             :     // WGS 84 (G1762) 3D
    6212           2 :     auto src = authFactoryEPSG->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("7665");
    6213           2 :     auto objDst = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    6214           3 :         "+proj=longlat +datum=NAD83 +geoidgrids=@foo.gtx +type=crs");
    6215           1 :     auto dst = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(objDst);
    6216           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(dst != nullptr);
    6217             :     auto authFactory =
    6218           4 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), std::string());
    6219           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    6220           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    6221             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    6222           1 :     ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    6223             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    6224             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);

    6229             :               "Inverse of WGS 84 to WGS 84 (G1762) + "

    6231             :               "Inverse of NAD83 to WGS 84 (1) + "

    6316           8 : TEST(operation, transformation_Geographic3D_to_GravityRelatedHeight_gtx) {
    6317             :     auto wkt =

    6321             :         "        GEOGCRS[\"ETRS89\",\n"

    6325             :         "            PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"

    6327             :         "            CS[ellipsoidal,3],\n"
    6328             :         "                AXIS[\"geodetic latitude (Lat)\",north,\n"

    6330             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"

    6332             :         "                    ORDER[2],\n"
    6333             :         "                    ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"

    6335             :         "                    ORDER[3],\n"

    6340             :         "            VDATUM[\"Normaal Amsterdams Peil\"],\n"

    6342             :         "                AXIS[\"gravity-related height (H)\",up,\n"
    6343             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n"

    6348             :         "file\",\"naptrans2008.gtx\"],\n"
    6349             :         "    OPERATIONACCURACY[0.01],\n"

    6351             :         "        SCOPE[\"unknown\"],\n"

    6566           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_with_boundGeogCRS_and_boundVerticalCRS_to_geogCRS) {
    6567             :

    6569           4 :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4807, std::vector<double>{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7});
    6570             :     auto compound = CompoundCRS::create(
    6571           2 :         PropertyMap(),

    6573           2 :     auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    6574           3 :         compound, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4979);
    6575           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    6576             :     // Not completely sure the order of horizontal and vertical operations
    6577             :     // makes sense
    6578           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    6579             :               "+proj=pipeline "
    6580             :               "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 "
    6581             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=grad +xy_out=rad "
    6582             :               "+step +inv +proj=longlat +ellps=clrk80ign +pm=paris "
    6583             :               "+step +proj=push +v_3 "
    6584             :               "+step +proj=cart +ellps=clrk80ign "
    6585             :               "+step +proj=helmert +x=1 +y=2 +z=3 +rx=4 +ry=5 +rz=6 +s=7 "
    6586             :               "+convention=position_vector "
    6587             :               "+step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 "
    6588             :               "+step +proj=pop +v_3 "
    6589             :               "+step +proj=vgridshift +grids=egm08_25.gtx +multiplier=1 "
    6590             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg "
    6591           1 :               "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    6592             : 
    6593           4 :     auto grids = op->gridsNeeded(DatabaseContext::create());
    6594           4 :     EXPECT_EQ(grids.size(), 1U);
    6595             : 
    6596           2 :     auto opInverse = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    6597           3 :         GeographicCRS::EPSG_4979, compound);
    6598           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(opInverse != nullptr);
    6599           4 :     EXPECT_TRUE(opInverse->inverse()->isEquivalentTo(op.get()));
    6600             : }
    6601             :

    6980           3 :         nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<VerticalCRS>(WKTParser().createFromWKT(
    6981             :             "VERTCRS[\"my depth (ftUS)\",VDATUM[\"my datum\"],CS[vertical,1],"
    6982             :             "AXIS[\"depth (D)\",down,LENGTHUNIT[\"US survey "
    6983           1 :             "foot\",0.304800609601219]]]"));
    6984           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(vertCRSMetreDownFtUS != nullptr);
    6985             : 
    6986             :     {
    6987           2 :         auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    6988           7 :             NN_CHECK_ASSERT(vertCRSMetreUp), NN_CHECK_ASSERT(vertCRSMetreDown));
    6989           2 :         ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    6990           6 :         EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    6991           1 :                   "+proj=axisswap +order=1,2,-3");
    6992             :     }
    6993             : 
    6994             :     {
    6995           2 :         auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    6996           2 :             NN_CHECK_ASSERT(vertCRSMetreUp),
    6997           5 :             NN_CHECK_ASSERT(vertCRSMetreDownFtUS));
    6998           2 :         ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    6999           6 :         EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    7000           1 :                   "+proj=affine +s33=-3.28083333333333");
    7001             :     }
    7002             : }
    7003             : 
    7004             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    7005             : 
    7006           8 : TEST(operation, vertCRS_to_vertCRS_context) {
    7007             :     auto authFactory =
    7008           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7009           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7010           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    7011             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    7012           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7013             :         // NGVD29 height (m)
    7014           3 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("7968"),
    7015             :         // NAVD88 height (1)

    7017           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 3U);
    7018           4 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->nameStr(), "NGVD29 height (m) to NAVD88 height (3)");

    7025           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_to_geogCRS_3D) {
    7026             : 
    7027           2 :     auto compoundcrs_ft_obj = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    7028           3 :         "+proj=merc +vunits=ft +type=crs");
    7029           1 :     auto compoundcrs_ft = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(compoundcrs_ft_obj);
    7030           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(compoundcrs_ft != nullptr);
    7031             : 
    7032           2 :     auto geogcrs_m_obj = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    7033           3 :         "+proj=longlat +vunits=m +type=crs");
    7034           1 :     auto geogcrs_m = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(geogcrs_m_obj);
    7035           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(geogcrs_m != nullptr);
    7036             : 
    7037             :     {
    7038           2 :         auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    7039           7 :             NN_CHECK_ASSERT(compoundcrs_ft), NN_CHECK_ASSERT(geogcrs_m));
    7040           2 :         ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    7041           3 :         EXPECT_TRUE(op->hasBallparkTransformation());
    7042           6 :         EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    7043             :                   "+proj=pipeline +step +inv +proj=merc +lon_0=0 +k=1 +x_0=0 "
    7044             :                   "+y_0=0 +ellps=WGS84 +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad "
    7045           1 :                   "+z_in=ft +xy_out=deg +z_out=m");
    7046             :     }
    7047             : 
    7048             :     {
    7049           2 :         auto op = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(
    7050           7 :             NN_CHECK_ASSERT(geogcrs_m), NN_CHECK_ASSERT(compoundcrs_ft));
    7051           2 :         ASSERT_TRUE(op != nullptr);
    7052           3 :         EXPECT_TRUE(op->hasBallparkTransformation());
    7053           6 :         EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    7054             :                   "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +z_in=m "
    7055             :                   "+xy_out=rad +z_out=ft +step +proj=merc +lon_0=0 +k=1 +x_0=0 "
    7056           1 :                   "+y_0=0 +ellps=WGS84");
    7057             :     }
    7058             : }
    7059             : 
    7060             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

    7062           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_to_geogCRS_3D_context) {
    7063             :     auto authFactory =
    7064           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7065             :     // CompoundCRS to Geog3DCRS, with vertical unit change, but without
    7066             :     // ellipsoid height <--> vertical height correction
    7067             :     {
    7068             :         auto ctxt =
    7069           2 :             CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7070           1 :         ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    7071             :             CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    7072             :                 IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);
    7073           2 :         auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7074           3 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem(
    7075             :                 "7406"), // NAD27 + NGVD29 height (ftUS)
    7076           3 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4979"), // WGS 84
    7077           2 :             ctxt);
    7078           3 :         ASSERT_GE(list.size(), 1U);
    7079           4 :         EXPECT_TRUE(list[0]->hasBallparkTransformation());
    7080           3 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->nameStr(),
    7081             :                   "NAD27 to WGS 84 (79) + Transformation from NGVD29 height "
    7082             :                   "(ftUS) to WGS 84 (ballpark vertical transformation, without "
    7083           1 :                   "ellipsoid height to vertical height correction)");
    7084           8 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(
    7085             :                       PROJStringFormatter::create(
    7086             :                           PROJStringFormatter::Convention::PROJ_5,
    7087             :                           authFactory->databaseContext())
    7088             :                           .get()),
    7089             :                   "+proj=pipeline +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 +step "
    7090             :                   "+proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad +step "
    7091             :                   "+proj=hgridshift +grids=conus +step +proj=unitconvert "
    7092             :                   "+xy_in=rad +z_in=us-ft +xy_out=deg +z_out=m +step "
    7093           1 :                   "+proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    7094             :     }
    7095             : 
    7096             :     // CompoundCRS to Geog3DCRS, with same vertical unit, and with
    7097             :     // direct ellipsoid height <--> vertical height correction and
    7098             :     // direct horizontal transform (no-op here)

    7100             :         auto ctxt =
    7101           2 :             CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7102           1 :         ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    7103             :             CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    7104             :                 IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);

    7106           3 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem(
    7107             :                 "5500"), // NAD83(NSRS2007) + NAVD88 height
    7108           3 :             authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4979"), // WGS 84
    7109           2 :             ctxt);
    7110           3 :         ASSERT_GE(list.size(), 1U);
    7111           3 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->nameStr(),
    7112             :                   "Inverse of NAD83(NSRS2007) to NAVD88 height (1) + "
    7113           1 :                   "NAD83(NSRS2007) to WGS 84 (1)");
    7114           8 :         EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(
    7115             :                       PROJStringFormatter::create(
    7116             :                           PROJStringFormatter::Convention::PROJ_5,
    7117             :                           authFactory->databaseContext())
    7118             :                           .get()),

    7120             :                   "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1 "
    7121             :                   "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad "
    7122             :                   "+step +proj=vgridshift +grids=geoid09_conus.gtx "
    7123             :                   "+multiplier=1 "
    7124             :                   "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg "
    7125           1 :                   "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    7126             :     }
    7127             : 
    7128             :     // NAD83 + NAVD88 height --> WGS 84
    7129             :     {
    7130             :         auto ctxt =
    7131           2 :             CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7132           1 :         ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    7133             :             CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);

    7139           4 :             "EPSG:4269+5703", authFactory->databaseContext(), false);

    7166           1 :                   "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    7167             :     }
    7168             :

    7270           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_from_wkt_without_id_to_geogCRS) {
    7271             :     auto authFactory =
    7272           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7273           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7274           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    7275             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    7276           1 :     ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    7277             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    7278             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);
    7279             :     auto wkt =
    7280             :         "COMPOUNDCRS[\"NAD83(2011) + NAVD88 height\",\n"
    7281             :         "    GEOGCRS[\"NAD83(2011)\",\n"
    7282             :         "        DATUM[\"NAD83 (National Spatial Reference System 2011)\",\n"
    7283             :         "            ELLIPSOID[\"GRS 1980\",6378137,298.257222101,\n"
    7284             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    7285             :         "        PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    7286             :         "            ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    7287             :         "        CS[ellipsoidal,2],\n"
    7288             :         "            AXIS[\"geodetic latitude (Lat)\",north,\n"
    7289             :         "                ORDER[1],\n"
    7290             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n"
    7291             :         "            AXIS[\"geodetic longitude (Lon)\",east,\n"
    7292             :         "                ORDER[2],\n"
    7293             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]]],\n"
    7294             :         "    VERTCRS[\"NAVD88 height\",\n"
    7295             :         "        VDATUM[\"North American Vertical Datum 1988\"],\n"
    7296             :         "        CS[vertical,1],\n"
    7297             :         "            AXIS[\"gravity-related height (H)\",up,\n"
    7298             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]]]";

    7300           4 :         createFromUserInput(wkt, authFactory->databaseContext(), false);

    7304           2 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("6319"); // NAD83(2011)
    7305             : 
    7306           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7307           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(src), dst, ctxt);

    7312           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(srcRef != nullptr);
    7313           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(
    7314           1 :         src->isEquivalentTo(srcRef.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));

    7316           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(srcRef), dst, ctxt);

    7322             : 
    7323           8 : TEST(operation,
    7324             :      compoundCRS_of_projCRS_from_wkt_without_id_or_extent_to_geogCRS) {
    7325             :     auto authFactory =
    7326           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7327           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7328           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    7329             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    7330           1 :     ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    7331             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    7332             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);
    7333             :     auto wkt =
    7334             :         "COMPOUNDCRS[\"NAD83 / Pennsylvania South + NAVD88 height\",\n"
    7335             :         "    PROJCRS[\"NAD83 / Pennsylvania South\",\n"
    7336             :         "        BASEGEOGCRS[\"NAD83\",\n"
    7337             :         "            DATUM[\"North American Datum 1983\",\n"
    7338             :         "                ELLIPSOID[\"GRS 1980\",6378137,298.257222101,\n"
    7339             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    7340             :         "            PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    7341             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]]],\n"
    7342             :         "        CONVERSION[\"SPCS83 Pennsylvania South zone (meters)\",\n"
    7343             :         "            METHOD[\"Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)\",\n"
    7344             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",9802]],\n"
    7345             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Latitude of false origin\",39.3333333333333,\n"
    7346             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7347             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8821]],\n"
    7348             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Longitude of false origin\",-77.75,\n"
    7349             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7350             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8822]],\n"
    7351             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Latitude of 1st standard "
    7352             :         "parallel\",40.9666666666667,\n"
    7353             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7354             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8823]],\n"
    7355             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Latitude of 2nd standard "
    7356             :         "parallel\",39.9333333333333,\n"
    7357             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7358             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8824]],\n"
    7359             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Easting at false origin\",600000,\n"
    7360             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    7361             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8826]],\n"
    7362             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Northing at false origin\",0,\n"
    7363             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    7364             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8827]]],\n"
    7365             :         "        CS[Cartesian,2],\n"
    7366             :         "            AXIS[\"easting (X)\",east,\n"
    7367             :         "                ORDER[1],\n"
    7368             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n"
    7369             :         "            AXIS[\"northing (Y)\",north,\n"
    7370             :         "                ORDER[2],\n"
    7371             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    7372             :         "    VERTCRS[\"NAVD88 height\",\n"
    7373             :         "        VDATUM[\"North American Vertical Datum 1988\"],\n"
    7374             :         "        CS[vertical,1],\n"
    7375             :         "            AXIS[\"gravity-related height (H)\",up,\n"
    7376             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]]]";
    7377             :     auto srcObj =
    7378           4 :         createFromUserInput(wkt, authFactory->databaseContext(), false);
    7379           1 :     auto src = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(srcObj);
    7380           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src != nullptr);
    7381           2 :     auto dst = authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4269"); // NAD83
    7382             : 
    7383           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7384           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(src), dst, ctxt);
    7385             :     // NAD83 / Pennsylvania South + NAVD88 height
    7386             :     auto srcRefObj = createFromUserInput("EPSG:32129+5703",
    7387           4 :                                          authFactory->databaseContext(), false);
    7388           1 :     auto srcRef = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(srcRefObj);
    7389           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(srcRef != nullptr);
    7390           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(
    7391           1 :         src->isEquivalentTo(srcRef.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    7392           2 :     auto listRef = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7393           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(srcRef), dst, ctxt);
    7394             : 
    7395           5 :     EXPECT_EQ(list.size(), listRef.size());
    7396             : }
    7397             : 
    7398             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    7399             : 
    7400           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_to_geogCRS_with_vertical_unit_change) {
    7401             :     auto authFactory =
    7402           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7403           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7404           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    7405             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);

    7408             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);

    7411           4 :                                       authFactory->databaseContext(), false);

    7419           2 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(nnSrc, dst,
    7420           2 :                                                                ctxt);
    7421           3 :     ASSERT_TRUE(!listCompoundToGeog.empty());
    7422             : 
    7423             :     // NAD83(2011) + NAVD88 height
    7424             :     auto srcObjCompoundVMetre = createFromUserInput(
    7425           4 :         "EPSG:6318+5703", authFactory->databaseContext(), false);
    7426           1 :     auto srcCompoundVMetre = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(srcObjCompoundVMetre);
    7427           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(srcCompoundVMetre != nullptr);

    7429           2 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7430           3 :             NN_NO_CHECK(srcCompoundVMetre), dst, ctxt);

    7432             :     // Check that we get the same and similar results whether we start from
    7433             :     // regular NAVD88 height or its ftUs variant
    7434           5 :     ASSERT_EQ(listCompoundToGeog.size(), listCompoundMetreToGeog.size());
    7435             :

    7437             :               "Inverse of NAVD88 height to NAVD88 height (ftUS) + " +
    7438           1 :                   listCompoundMetreToGeog[0]->nameStr());
    7439          18 :     EXPECT_EQ(
    7440             :         listCompoundToGeog[0]->exportToPROJString(
    7441             :             PROJStringFormatter::create(PROJStringFormatter::Convention::PROJ_5,
    7442             :                                         authFactory->databaseContext())
    7443             :                 .get()),
    7444             :         replaceAll(listCompoundMetreToGeog[0]->exportToPROJString(
    7445             :                        PROJStringFormatter::create(

    7448             :                            .get()),
    7449             :                    "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=deg +xy_out=rad",

    7452             : 
    7453             :     // Check reverse path

    7455           2 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(dst, nnSrc,

    7649           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_of_vertCRS_with_geoid_model_to_geogCRS) {
    7650             :     auto authFactory =
    7651           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7652           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7653           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    7654             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    7655           1 :     ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    7656             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    7657             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);
    7658             :     auto wkt =
    7659             :         "COMPOUNDCRS[\"NAD83 / Pennsylvania South + NAVD88 height\",\n"
    7660             :         "    PROJCRS[\"NAD83 / Pennsylvania South\",\n"
    7661             :         "        BASEGEOGCRS[\"NAD83\",\n"
    7662             :         "            DATUM[\"North American Datum 1983\",\n"
    7663             :         "                ELLIPSOID[\"GRS 1980\",6378137,298.257222101,\n"
    7664             :         "                    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    7665             :         "            PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n"
    7666             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]]],\n"
    7667             :         "        CONVERSION[\"SPCS83 Pennsylvania South zone (meters)\",\n"
    7668             :         "            METHOD[\"Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)\",\n"
    7669             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",9802]],\n"
    7670             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Latitude of false origin\",39.3333333333333,\n"
    7671             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7672             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8821]],\n"
    7673             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Longitude of false origin\",-77.75,\n"
    7674             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7675             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8822]],\n"
    7676             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Latitude of 1st standard "
    7677             :         "parallel\",40.9666666666667,\n"
    7678             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7679             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8823]],\n"
    7680             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Latitude of 2nd standard "
    7681             :         "parallel\",39.9333333333333,\n"
    7682             :         "                ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n"
    7683             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8824]],\n"
    7684             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Easting at false origin\",600000,\n"
    7685             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    7686             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8826]],\n"
    7687             :         "            PARAMETER[\"Northing at false origin\",0,\n"
    7688             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n"
    7689             :         "                ID[\"EPSG\",8827]]],\n"
    7690             :         "        CS[Cartesian,2],\n"
    7691             :         "            AXIS[\"easting (X)\",east,\n"
    7692             :         "                ORDER[1],\n"
    7693             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n"
    7694             :         "            AXIS[\"northing (Y)\",north,\n"
    7695             :         "                ORDER[2],\n"
    7696             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n"
    7697             :         "    VERTCRS[\"NAVD88 height\",\n"
    7698             :         "        VDATUM[\"North American Vertical Datum 1988\"],\n"
    7699             :         "        CS[vertical,1],\n"
    7700             :         "            AXIS[\"gravity-related height (H)\",up,\n"
    7701             :         "                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n"
    7702             :         "        GEOIDMODEL[\"GEOID12B\"]]]";
    7703             :     auto srcObj =
    7704           4 :         createFromUserInput(wkt, authFactory->databaseContext(), false);
    7705           1 :     auto src = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(srcObj);
    7706           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src != nullptr);
    7707           2 :     auto dst = authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4269"); // NAD83
    7708             : 
    7709           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7710           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(src), dst, ctxt);
    7711           3 :     ASSERT_TRUE(!list.empty());
    7712           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->nameStr(),
    7713             :               "Inverse of SPCS83 Pennsylvania South zone (meters) + "
    7714             :               "Ballpark geographic offset from NAD83 to NAD83(2011) + "
    7715             :               "Inverse of NAD83(2011) to NAVD88 height (1) + "
    7716           1 :               "Ballpark geographic offset from NAD83(2011) to NAD83");
    7717             :     auto op_proj =
    7718           6 :         list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get());
    7719           1 :     EXPECT_EQ(op_proj,
    7720             :               "+proj=pipeline "
    7721             :               "+step +inv +proj=lcc +lat_0=39.3333333333333 +lon_0=-77.75 "
    7722             :               "+lat_1=40.9666666666667 +lat_2=39.9333333333333 +x_0=600000 "
    7723             :               "+y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 "
    7724             :               "+step +proj=vgridshift +grids=g2012bu0.gtx +multiplier=1 "
    7725             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg "
    7726           1 :               "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    7727             : }
    7728             : 
    7729             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    7730             : 
    7731           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_from_WKT2_to_geogCRS_3D_context) {
    7732             :     auto authFactory =
    7733           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7734           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7735             :     auto src = authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem(
    7736           2 :         "7415"); // Amersfoort / RD New + NAP height
    7737             :     auto dst =
    7738           2 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4937"); // ETRS89 3D
    7739             :     auto list =
    7740           4 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(src, dst, ctxt);
    7741           3 :     ASSERT_GE(list.size(), 1U);
    7742             :     auto wkt2 = src->exportToWKT(
    7743           5 :         WKTFormatter::create(WKTFormatter::Convention::WKT2_2019).get());
    7744           2 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt2);
    7745           1 :     auto src_from_wkt2 = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(obj);
    7746           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src_from_wkt2 != nullptr);
    7747           2 :     auto list2 = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7748           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(src_from_wkt2), dst, ctxt);
    7749           4 :     ASSERT_GE(list.size(), list2.size());
    7750          32 :     for (size_t i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
    7751             :         const auto &op = list[i];
    7752          10 :         const auto &op2 = list2[i];
    7753          30 :         EXPECT_TRUE(
    7754          10 :             op->isEquivalentTo(op2.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    7755             :     }
    7756             : }
    7757             : 
    7758             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    7759             : 
    7760           8 : TEST(operation, compoundCRS_from_WKT2_no_id_to_geogCRS_3D_context) {
    7761             :     auto authFactory =
    7762           5 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG");
    7763           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7764           1 :     ctxt->setSpatialCriterion(
    7765             :         CoordinateOperationContext::SpatialCriterion::PARTIAL_INTERSECTION);
    7766             :     auto src = authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem(
    7767           2 :         "7415"); // Amersfoort / RD New + NAP height
    7768             :     auto dst =
    7769           2 :         authFactory->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4937"); // ETRS89 3D
    7770             :     auto list =
    7771           4 :         CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(src, dst, ctxt);
    7772           3 :     ASSERT_GE(list.size(), 1U);
    7773             : 
    7774             :     {
    7775             :         // Important here is vgridshift before hgridshift
    7776             :         auto op_proj =
    7777           6 :             list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get());
    7778           1 :         EXPECT_EQ(
    7779             :             op_proj,
    7780             :             "+proj=pipeline +step +inv +proj=sterea +lat_0=52.1561605555556 "
    7781             :             "+lon_0=5.38763888888889 +k=0.9999079 +x_0=155000 +y_0=463000 "
    7782             :             "+ellps=bessel "
    7783             :             "+step +proj=vgridshift +grids=naptrans2008.gtx +multiplier=1 "
    7784             :             "+step +proj=hgridshift +grids=rdtrans2008.gsb "
    7785             :             "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg "
    7786           1 :             "+step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    7787             :     }
    7788             : 
    7789             :     auto wkt2 =
    7790             :         "COMPOUNDCRS[\"unknown\",\n"
    7791             :         "  PROJCRS[\"unknown\",\n"
    7792             :         "    BASEGEOGCRS[\"Amersfoort\",\n"
    7793             :         "            DATUM[\"Amersfoort\",\n"
    7794             :         "                ELLIPSOID[\"Bessel "
    7795             :         "1841\",6377397.155,299.1528128]]],\n"
    7796             :         "    CONVERSION[\"unknown\",\n"
    7797             :         "        METHOD[\"Oblique Stereographic\"],\n"
    7798             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Latitude of natural origin\",52.1561605555556],\n"
    7799             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",5.38763888888889],\n"
    7800             :         "        PARAMETER[\"Scale factor at natural origin\",0.9999079],\n"
    7801             :         "        PARAMETER[\"False easting\",155000],\n"
    7802             :         "        PARAMETER[\"False northing\",463000]],\n"
    7803             :         "    CS[Cartesian,2],\n"
    7804             :         "        AXIS[\"(E)\",east],\n"
    7805             :         "        AXIS[\"(N)\",north],\n"
    7806             :         "    LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n"
    7807             :         "  VERTCRS[\"NAP height\",\n"
    7808             :         "    VDATUM[\"Normaal Amsterdams Peil\"],\n"
    7809             :         "    CS[vertical,1],\n"
    7810             :         "        AXIS[\"gravity-related height (H)\",up,\n"
    7811             :         "            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]]]";
    7812           3 :     auto obj = WKTParser().createFromWKT(wkt2);
    7813           1 :     auto src_from_wkt2 = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(obj);
    7814           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src_from_wkt2 != nullptr);
    7815           2 :     auto list2 = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7816           3 :         NN_NO_CHECK(src_from_wkt2), dst, ctxt);
    7817           4 :     ASSERT_GE(list.size(), list2.size() - 1);
    7818          32 :     for (size_t i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
    7819             :         const auto &op = list[i];
    7820          10 :         const auto &op2 = list2[i];
    7821             :         auto op_proj =
    7822          50 :             op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get());
    7823             :         auto op2_proj =
    7824          50 :             op2->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get());
    7825          10 :         EXPECT_EQ(op_proj, op2_proj) << "op=" << op->nameStr()
    7826          10 :                                      << " op2=" << op2->nameStr();
    7827             :     }
    7828             : }

    7879           7 :         NN_CHECK_ASSERT(dst), NN_CHECK_ASSERT(src));

    7886           8 : TEST(operation, IGNF_LAMB1_TO_EPSG_4326) {
    7887             :     auto authFactory =
    7888           4 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), std::string());
    7889           2 :     auto ctxt = CoordinateOperationContext::create(authFactory, nullptr, 0.0);
    7890           1 :     ctxt->setGridAvailabilityUse(
    7891             :         CoordinateOperationContext::GridAvailabilityUse::
    7892             :             IGNORE_GRID_AVAILABILITY);
    7893           1 :     ctxt->setAllowUseIntermediateCRS(
    7894             :         CoordinateOperationContext::IntermediateCRSUse::ALWAYS);
    7895           2 :     auto list = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7896           6 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "IGNF")
    7897           3 :             ->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("LAMB1"),
    7898           6 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG")
    7899           3 :             ->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4326"),
    7900           2 :         ctxt);
    7901           4 :     ASSERT_EQ(list.size(), 2U);
    7902             : 
    7903           4 :     EXPECT_FALSE(list[0]->hasBallparkTransformation());
    7904           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    7905             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +inv +proj=lcc +lat_1=49.5 +lat_0=49.5 "
    7906             :               "+lon_0=0 +k_0=0.99987734 +x_0=600000 +y_0=200000 "
    7907             :               "+ellps=clrk80ign +pm=paris +step +proj=hgridshift "
    7908             :               "+grids=ntf_r93.gsb +step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad "
    7909           1 :               "+xy_out=deg +step +proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    7910             : 
    7911           4 :     EXPECT_FALSE(list[1]->hasBallparkTransformation());
    7912           7 :     EXPECT_EQ(list[1]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    7913             :               "+proj=pipeline +step +inv +proj=lcc +lat_1=49.5 +lat_0=49.5 "
    7914             :               "+lon_0=0 +k_0=0.99987734 +x_0=600000 +y_0=200000 "
    7915             :               "+ellps=clrk80ign +pm=paris +step +proj=push +v_3 +step "
    7916             :               "+proj=cart +ellps=clrk80ign +step +proj=helmert +x=-168 +y=-60 "
    7917             :               "+z=320 +step +inv +proj=cart +ellps=WGS84 +step +proj=pop +v_3 "
    7918             :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg +step "
    7919           1 :               "+proj=axisswap +order=2,1");
    7920             : 
    7921           2 :     auto list2 = CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperations(
    7922           6 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG")

    7924           3 :             ->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("27561"),
    7925           6 :         AuthorityFactory::create(DatabaseContext::create(), "EPSG")
    7926           3 :             ->createCoordinateReferenceSystem("4326"),
    7927           2 :         ctxt);
    7928           3 :     ASSERT_GE(list2.size(), 3U);

    7931             :                              PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    7932             :                          "0.999877341", "0.99987734"),
    7933           1 :               list[0]->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()));

    7969           8 : TEST(operation, isPROJInstantiable) {
    7970             : 
    7971             :     {
    7972             :         auto transformation = Transformation::createGeocentricTranslations(
    7973           2 :             PropertyMap(), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4269, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326,
    7974           3 :             1.0, 2.0, 3.0, {});
    7975           4 :         EXPECT_TRUE(
    7976           1 :             transformation->isPROJInstantiable(DatabaseContext::create()));
    7977             :     }
    7978             : 
    7979             :     // Missing grid
    7980             :     {
    7981             :         auto transformation = Transformation::createNTv2(
    7982           2 :             PropertyMap(), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4807, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326,
    7983           5 :             "foo.gsb", std::vector<PositionalAccuracyNNPtr>());
    7984           4 :         EXPECT_FALSE(
    7985           1 :             transformation->isPROJInstantiable(DatabaseContext::create()));
    7986             :     }
    7987             : 
    7988             :     // Unsupported method
    7989             :     {
    7990             :         auto transformation = Transformation::create(
    7991           2 :             PropertyMap(), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4269, GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326,
    7992           2 :             nullptr, OperationMethod::create(
    7993           2 :                          PropertyMap(), std::vector<OperationParameterNNPtr>{}),
    7994           1 :             std::vector<GeneralParameterValueNNPtr>{},
    7995           5 :             std::vector<PositionalAccuracyNNPtr>{});
    7996           4 :         EXPECT_FALSE(
    7997           1 :             transformation->isPROJInstantiable(DatabaseContext::create()));
    7998             :     }
    7999           1 : }

    8173           6 :     EXPECT_EQ(op->exportToPROJString(PROJStringFormatter::create().get()),
    8174             :               "+proj=pipeline "
    8175             :               "+step +inv +proj=utm +zone=11 +datum=NAD27 +over "
    8176             :               "+step +proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +over "
    8177           1 :               "+step +proj=unitconvert +xy_in=rad +xy_out=deg");
    8178             : }
    8179             : 
    8180             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    8181             :

    8183             :     operation,

    8186           5 :         createFromUserInput("EPSG:4326", DatabaseContext::create(), false);

    8191           3 :         "+proj=utm +zone=31 +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=1,2,3 +over +type=crs");

    8232           8 : TEST(operation, createOperation_ossfuzz_18587) {
    8233             :     auto objSrc =
    8234           5 :         createFromUserInput("EPSG:4326", DatabaseContext::create(), false);
    8235           1 :     auto src = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(objSrc);
    8236           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(src != nullptr);
    8237             : 
    8238             :     // Extremly weird string ! We should likely reject it
    8239           2 :     auto objDst = PROJStringParser().createFromPROJString(
    8240             :         "type=crs proj=pipeline step proj=merc vunits=m nadgrids=@x "
    8241           3 :         "proj=\"\nproj=pipeline step\n\"");
    8242           1 :     auto dst = nn_dynamic_pointer_cast<CRS>(objDst);
    8243           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(dst != nullptr);
    8244             : 
    8245             :     // Just check that we don't go into an infinite recursion
    8246           7 :     CoordinateOperationFactory::create()->createOperation(NN_CHECK_ASSERT(src),
    8247           3 :                                                           NN_CHECK_ASSERT(dst));
    8248             : }

    8252           8 : TEST(operation, mercator_variant_A_to_variant_B) {
    8253             :     auto projCRS = ProjectedCRS::create(
    8254           2 :         PropertyMap(), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4326,
    8255           2 :         Conversion::createMercatorVariantA(PropertyMap(), Angle(0), Angle(1),
    8256           2 :                                            Scale(0.9), Length(3), Length(4)),
    8257           4 :         CartesianCS::createEastingNorthing(UnitOfMeasure::METRE));
    8258             : 
    8259           1 :     auto conv = projCRS->derivingConversion();
    8260             :     auto sameConv =
    8261           1 :         conv->convertToOtherMethod(EPSG_CODE_METHOD_MERCATOR_VARIANT_A);
    8262           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(sameConv);
    8263           4 :     EXPECT_TRUE(sameConv->isEquivalentTo(conv.get()));
    8264             : 
    8265             :     auto targetConv =
    8266           1 :         conv->convertToOtherMethod(EPSG_CODE_METHOD_MERCATOR_VARIANT_B);
    8267           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(targetConv);
    8268             : 
    8269           1 :     auto lat_1 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8270           1 :         EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_1ST_STD_PARALLEL, UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8271           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(lat_1, 25.917499691810534) << lat_1;
    8272             : 
    8273           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8274             :                   EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LONGITUDE_OF_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8275             :                   UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE),
    8276           1 :               1);
    8277             : 
    8278           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8279             :                   EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_EASTING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE),
    8280           1 :               3);
    8281             : 
    8282           3 :     EXPECT_EQ(targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8283             :                   EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_NORTHING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE),
    8284           1 :               4);
    8285             : 
    8286           2 :     EXPECT_FALSE(
    8287           1 :         conv->isEquivalentTo(targetConv.get(), IComparable::Criterion::STRICT));
    8288           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->isEquivalentTo(targetConv.get(),
    8289           1 :                                      IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8290           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(targetConv->isEquivalentTo(conv.get(),
    8291           1 :                                            IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8292             : }
    8293             :

    8427           8 : TEST(operation, lcc2sp_to_lcc1sp) {
    8428             :     // equivalent to EPSG:2154
    8429             :     auto projCRS = ProjectedCRS::create(
    8430           2 :         PropertyMap(), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4269, // something using GRS80
    8431           2 :         Conversion::createLambertConicConformal_2SP(
    8432           2 :             PropertyMap(), Angle(46.5), Angle(3), Angle(49), Angle(44),
    8433           2 :             Length(700000), Length(6600000)),
    8434           4 :         CartesianCS::createEastingNorthing(UnitOfMeasure::METRE));
    8435             : 
    8436           1 :     auto conv = projCRS->derivingConversion();
    8437             :     auto targetConv = conv->convertToOtherMethod(
    8438           1 :         EPSG_CODE_METHOD_LAMBERT_CONIC_CONFORMAL_1SP);
    8439           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(targetConv);
    8440             : 
    8441             :     {
    8442           1 :         auto lat_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8443             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_OF_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8444             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8445           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_0, 46.519430223986866, 1e-12) << lat_0;
    8446             : 
    8447           1 :         auto lon_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8448             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LONGITUDE_OF_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8449             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8450           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lon_0, 3.0, 1e-15) << lon_0;
    8451             : 
    8452           1 :         auto k_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8453             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_SCALE_FACTOR_AT_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8454             :             UnitOfMeasure::SCALE_UNITY);
    8455           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(k_0, 0.9990510286374692, 1e-15) << k_0;
    8456             : 
    8457           1 :         auto x_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8458             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_EASTING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8459           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(x_0, 700000, 1e-15) << x_0;
    8460             : 
    8461           1 :         auto y_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8462             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_NORTHING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8463           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(y_0, 6602157.8388103368, 1e-7) << y_0;
    8464             :     }
    8465             : 
    8466             :     auto _2sp_from_1sp = targetConv->convertToOtherMethod(
    8467           1 :         EPSG_CODE_METHOD_LAMBERT_CONIC_CONFORMAL_2SP);
    8468           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(_2sp_from_1sp);
    8469             : 
    8470             :     {
    8471           1 :         auto lat_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8472             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8473           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_0, 46.5, 1e-15) << lat_0;
    8474             : 
    8475           1 :         auto lon_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8476             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LONGITUDE_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8477           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lon_0, 3, 1e-15) << lon_0;
    8478             : 
    8479           1 :         auto lat_1 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8480             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_1ST_STD_PARALLEL,
    8481             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8482           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_1, 49, 1e-15) << lat_1;
    8483             : 
    8484           1 :         auto lat_2 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8485             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_2ND_STD_PARALLEL,
    8486             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8487           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_2, 44, 1e-15) << lat_2;
    8488             : 
    8489           1 :         auto x_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8490             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_EASTING_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8491           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(x_0, 700000, 1e-15) << x_0;
    8492             : 
    8493           1 :         auto y_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8494             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_NORTHING_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8495           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(y_0, 6600000, 1e-15) << y_0;
    8496             :     }
    8497             : 
    8498           2 :     EXPECT_FALSE(
    8499           1 :         conv->isEquivalentTo(targetConv.get(), IComparable::Criterion::STRICT));
    8500           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->isEquivalentTo(targetConv.get(),
    8501           1 :                                      IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8502           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(targetConv->isEquivalentTo(conv.get(),
    8503           1 :                                            IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8504             : }
    8505             : 
    8506             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    8507             : 
    8508           8 : TEST(operation, lcc2sp_to_lcc1sp_phi0_eq_phi1_eq_phi2) {
    8509             :     auto projCRS = ProjectedCRS::create(
    8510           2 :         PropertyMap(), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4269, // something using GRS80
    8511           2 :         Conversion::createLambertConicConformal_2SP(
    8512           2 :             PropertyMap(), Angle(46.5), Angle(3), Angle(46.5), Angle(46.5),
    8513           2 :             Length(700000), Length(6600000)),
    8514           4 :         CartesianCS::createEastingNorthing(UnitOfMeasure::METRE));
    8515             : 
    8516           1 :     auto conv = projCRS->derivingConversion();
    8517             :     auto targetConv = conv->convertToOtherMethod(
    8518           1 :         EPSG_CODE_METHOD_LAMBERT_CONIC_CONFORMAL_1SP);
    8519           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(targetConv);
    8520             : 
    8521             :     {
    8522           1 :         auto lat_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8523             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_OF_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8524             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8525           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_0, 46.5, 1e-15) << lat_0;
    8526             : 
    8527           1 :         auto lon_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8528             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LONGITUDE_OF_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8529             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8530           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lon_0, 3.0, 1e-15) << lon_0;
    8531             : 
    8532           1 :         auto k_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8533             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_SCALE_FACTOR_AT_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8534             :             UnitOfMeasure::SCALE_UNITY);
    8535           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(k_0, 1.0, 1e-15) << k_0;
    8536             : 
    8537           1 :         auto x_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8538             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_EASTING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8539           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(x_0, 700000, 1e-15) << x_0;
    8540             : 
    8541           1 :         auto y_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8542             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_NORTHING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8543           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(y_0, 6600000, 1e-15) << y_0;
    8544             :     }
    8545             : 
    8546             :     auto _2sp_from_1sp = targetConv->convertToOtherMethod(
    8547           1 :         EPSG_CODE_METHOD_LAMBERT_CONIC_CONFORMAL_2SP);
    8548           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(_2sp_from_1sp);
    8549             : 
    8550             :     {
    8551           1 :         auto lat_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8552             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8553           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_0, 46.5, 1e-15) << lat_0;
    8554             : 
    8555           1 :         auto lon_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8556             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LONGITUDE_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8557           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lon_0, 3, 1e-15) << lon_0;
    8558             : 
    8559           1 :         auto lat_1 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8560             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_1ST_STD_PARALLEL,
    8561             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8562           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_1, 46.5, 1e-15) << lat_1;
    8563             : 
    8564           1 :         auto lat_2 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8565             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_2ND_STD_PARALLEL,
    8566             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8567           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_2, 46.5, 1e-15) << lat_2;
    8568             : 
    8569           1 :         auto x_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8570             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_EASTING_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8571           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(x_0, 700000, 1e-15) << x_0;
    8572             : 
    8573           1 :         auto y_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8574             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_NORTHING_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8575           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(y_0, 6600000, 1e-15) << y_0;
    8576             :     }
    8577             : 
    8578           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->isEquivalentTo(targetConv.get(),
    8579           1 :                                      IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8580           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(targetConv->isEquivalentTo(conv.get(),
    8581           1 :                                            IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8582             : }
    8583             : 
    8584             : // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    8585             : 
    8586           8 : TEST(operation, lcc2sp_to_lcc1sp_phi0_diff_phi1_and_phi1_eq_phi2) {
    8587             : 
    8588             :     auto projCRS = ProjectedCRS::create(
    8589           2 :         PropertyMap(), GeographicCRS::EPSG_4269, // something using GRS80
    8590           2 :         Conversion::createLambertConicConformal_2SP(
    8591           2 :             PropertyMap(), Angle(46.123), Angle(3), Angle(46.4567),
    8592           2 :             Angle(46.4567), Length(700000), Length(6600000)),
    8593           4 :         CartesianCS::createEastingNorthing(UnitOfMeasure::METRE));
    8594             : 
    8595           1 :     auto conv = projCRS->derivingConversion();
    8596             :     auto targetConv = conv->convertToOtherMethod(
    8597           1 :         EPSG_CODE_METHOD_LAMBERT_CONIC_CONFORMAL_1SP);
    8598           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(targetConv);
    8599             : 
    8600             :     {
    8601           1 :         auto lat_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8602             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_OF_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8603             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8604           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_0, 46.4567, 1e-14) << lat_0;
    8605             : 
    8606           1 :         auto lon_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8607             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LONGITUDE_OF_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8608             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8609           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lon_0, 3.0, 1e-15) << lon_0;
    8610             : 
    8611           1 :         auto k_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8612             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_SCALE_FACTOR_AT_NATURAL_ORIGIN,
    8613             :             UnitOfMeasure::SCALE_UNITY);
    8614           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(k_0, 1.0, 1e-15) << k_0;
    8615             : 
    8616           1 :         auto x_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8617             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_EASTING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8618           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(x_0, 700000, 1e-15) << x_0;
    8619             : 
    8620           1 :         auto y_0 = targetConv->parameterValueNumeric(
    8621             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_FALSE_NORTHING, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8622           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(y_0, 6637093.292952879, 1e-8) << y_0;
    8623             :     }
    8624             : 
    8625             :     auto _2sp_from_1sp = targetConv->convertToOtherMethod(
    8626           1 :         EPSG_CODE_METHOD_LAMBERT_CONIC_CONFORMAL_2SP);
    8627           2 :     ASSERT_TRUE(_2sp_from_1sp);
    8628             : 
    8629             :     {
    8630           1 :         auto lat_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8631             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8632           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_0, 46.4567, 1e-14) << lat_0;
    8633             : 
    8634           1 :         auto lon_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8635             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LONGITUDE_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8636           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lon_0, 3, 1e-15) << lon_0;
    8637             : 
    8638           1 :         auto lat_1 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8639             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_1ST_STD_PARALLEL,
    8640             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8641           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_1, 46.4567, 1e-14) << lat_1;
    8642             : 
    8643           1 :         auto lat_2 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8644             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_LATITUDE_2ND_STD_PARALLEL,
    8645             :             UnitOfMeasure::DEGREE);
    8646           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(lat_2, 46.4567, 1e-14) << lat_2;
    8647             : 
    8648           1 :         auto x_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8649             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_EASTING_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8650           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(x_0, 700000, 1e-15) << x_0;
    8651             : 
    8652           1 :         auto y_0 = _2sp_from_1sp->parameterValueNumeric(
    8653             :             EPSG_CODE_PARAMETER_NORTHING_FALSE_ORIGIN, UnitOfMeasure::METRE);
    8654           2 :         EXPECT_NEAR(y_0, 6637093.292952879, 1e-8) << y_0;
    8655             :     }
    8656             : 
    8657           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->isEquivalentTo(targetConv.get(),
    8658           1 :                                      IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8659           3 :     EXPECT_TRUE(targetConv->isEquivalentTo(conv.get(),
    8660           1 :                                            IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8661             : 
    8662           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(_2sp_from_1sp->isEquivalentTo(
    8663           1 :         targetConv.get(), IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8664           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(targetConv->isEquivalentTo(_2sp_from_1sp.get(),
    8665           1 :                                            IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8666             : 
    8667           2 :     EXPECT_TRUE(conv->isEquivalentTo(_2sp_from_1sp.get(),
    8668           1 :                                      IComparable::Criterion::EQUIVALENT));
    8669             : }
    8670             :
